What is the difference between IgMatrix.message: What is the difference between IgMatrix and TikMatrix?

Which scripts from TikMatrix are availab.message: Which scripts from TikMatrix are available in IgMatrix?

Yes! The setup tutorial for IgMatrix is.message: Yes! The setup tutorial for IgMatrix is identical to TikMatrix. You can follow the TikMatrix documentation for installation, device connection, and basic configuration. Only the automation scripts will differ based on the platform.

Yes, IgMatrix and TikMatrix require sepa.message: Yes, IgMatrix and TikMatrix require separate licenses as they are different products optimized for different social media platforms. Each license is tied to specific software and cannot be used interchangeably.

You can install both IgMatrix and TikMat.message: You can install both IgMatrix and TikMatrix on the same computer, but they cannot run simultaneously due to runtime conflicts. You can only run one software at a time - either IgMatrix or TikMatrix.

homepage.vs.card.nodev.desc.message: Không yêu cầu kỹ năng lập trình

homepage.vs.card.plug.desc.message: Cắm là chạy, cấu hình dễ dàng

homepage.vs.card.realDevices.desc.message: Sử dụng thiết bị Android thật để đảm bảo an toàn tối đa

homepage.vs.subtitle.message: Giải pháp tự động mạnh mẽ để mở rộng hiện diện trên mạng xã hội

tech.point.fingerprint.b1.message: Unique IMEI / Android ID per device

tech.point.fingerprint.desc.message: Each device maintains unique hardware and software fingerprints with no cross-contamination.

tech.point.humanBehavior.desc.message: Behavior patterns derived from real user data, avoiding detectable automation features.

tech.point.localExec.desc.message: Scripts execute on local machines via ADB - no cloud relay, no third-party servers.

tech.point.passiveCapture.desc.message: Extract screen data via OCR and computer vision - no in-app hooks or memory injection.

tech.point.realTouch.desc.message: Inject real touch events at the Android input layer, indistinguishable from human interaction behavior.

tech.point.zeroApi.b3.message: Not affected by API rate limits

tech.point.zeroApi.desc.message: No TikTok API calls, no network request interception. All operations completed at the UI layer.

tech.subtitle.message: Anti-detection Architecture Built on Real Device Automation
